divs: Sighting Detailsi was at the top of the hill hiking down into the valley below. how i first noticed the object was because of this noise. it hurt my ears so bad. i think they were trying to communicate with me. when i saw it i thought it was a helecopter, but then it kept changing shapes and the colors were like none other i have ever seen. at first it was just hovering above makeing that noise. and then it started changeing shape, and i cant describe the colors (those colors were not from this earth, my mind could not comprehend them). the shapes were changing so fast it would go from little to big in an instant. it seem it was changing at the same time. i didnt know how to feel. i was emotionless. all i could do was stare. when i relized what i was seeing i ran into the empty bulldozer below. and then after this boom. it was gone.
trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Grants Pass
There were no other sightings in Grants Pass on or around March 27th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: it happend while i was hiking. i heard this noise and it was so loud. giant object of light
